verses.roman:
bāiśa 'pāhāca'-pāche upara dakṣiṇa-dike
eka nṛsiṁha-mūrti āchena uṭhite vāma-bhāge

synonyms: bāiśa pāhāca—of the twenty-two steps; pāche—toward the back; upara—above; dakṣiṇa-dike—on the southern side; eka—one; nṛsiṁha-mūrti—Deity of Lord Nṛsiṁha; āchena—there is; uṭhite—while stepping upward; vāma-bhāge—on the left side.
translation: On the southern side, behind and above the twenty-two steps, is a Deity of Lord Nṛsiṁhadeva. It is on the left as one goes up the steps toward the temple.
